thread.title: Beyoncé Is No Longer Performing at Coachella This Year
thread.title_full: Beyoncé Is No Longer Performing at Coachella This Year

title: Beyoncé Is No Longer Performing at Coachella This Year
text: Beyoncé Is No Longer Performing at Coachella This Year Getty By Alyssa Bailey Feb 23, 2017 Beyoncé was set to headline Coachella this year—and as recently as last week, reportedly told her team that as long as she was healthy , she would do the April concert despite being well into her pregnancy with twins. Today, however, Coachella organizers announced Bey was out on doctor's orders...but just for this year. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below So, is it really too early to buy 2018 tickets? Coachella, help us out. More from ELLE:
